gameInfo.controlsInfo: To move as the ShootAvatar, use the arrow keys to turn and move.

winRules.text: If time reaches 1000 seconds, then you will win.

loseRules.text: If avatar (citizen) and george (Chaser) collide, then the avatar (citizen) sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more avatar (citizen) sprites then you will lose.

pointsRules.text: If the annoyed (human) and the cigarette (Flicker) collide, then you will gain 1 point.
